questionList.question: What is the concept of 'Machine Learning'?
options: Machines learning from their own experiences
Machines being programmed to learn from data
questionList.correct: Machines being programmed to learn from data

questionList.question: Which programming language is commonly used in AI development?

title: LLM and NLP Quiz
subtitle: Test your knowledge of Large Language Models and Natural Language Processing!

questionList.question: What is a Large Language Model (LLM)?
options: A model that can understand and generate human-like text
A model used for image recognition
questionList.correct: A model that can understand and generate human-like text

questionList.question: Which of the following is a well-known Large Language Model developed by OpenAI?
What is Natural Language Processing (NLP)?
options: A field of AI concerned with the interaction between computers and humans through natural language
A technique for analyzing video content
questionList.correct: A field of AI concerned with the interaction between computers and humans through natural language

questionList.question: Which of the following is not a common task in NLP?
